p.s: In the following I am going to discuss why the work of the English poet Shakespeare should still be taught in German English classes.
First of all it should be mentioned that Shakespeare deals with timeless topics like love, nature, eternalityeternity, humanity and death.
These topics are still important in todaystoday's day.
Additionally one can see that his imaginative language can be a good point when it comes to education.
Students who become workers do not need to know anything about Shakespeare.
Shakespeare outlines fundamental experiences which sometimes are not problems people are concerned with nowadays.
Shakespeare invented 1400 words and they still use in every day English so maybe it is helpful or also neccessarynecessary to know who Shakespeare was.
People may think that the work of the English poet should not still be taught in classes because his language is very old and difficult to understand.
After discussing the pros and cons I think that it is very important to know who Shakespeare was and have a good look at his work.
Many television series and movies are adoptions of his work.
Students maybe can relate to Shakespeare's characters.
Another point could be that is wonderful and lovely poems about soul can be hopeful for people.
